questions.question: Can I cancel anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.

questions.question: Can I switch between plans?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and various other payment methods through Stripe.
